name: VertexToRect

inputs.name: Top Left
inputs.description: The vertex pixel position of top left corner

inputs.name: Top Right
inputs.description: The vertex pixel position of top right corner

inputs.name: Bottom Left
inputs.description: The vertex pixel position of bottom left corner

inputs.name: Bottom Right
inputs.description: The vertex pixel position of bottom right corner

outputs.name: Rect
outputs.description: A quadrilateral consisting of four vertices

description: Convert four vertices to a quadrilateral
